boundary.description: Scroll boundary value, which is set to a number to stop scrolling at a distance from the boundary of the scroll container.
boundary.description_zh: 滚动边界值，设置该值为数字后，将会在距离滚动容器 boundary 距离时停止滚动。

line-less.description: Whether to display the left axis line

change-hash.description: Whether to change the hash. When set to false, clicking on the anchor will not change the hash of the page
change-hash.description_zh: 是否改变hash。设置为 false 时点击锚点不会改变页面的 hash

smooth.description: Whether or not to use smooth scrolling

events.name: select
events.description: Triggered when a user clicks on a link
